text: The Avengers is a 2012 American superhero movie based on the Marvel Comics superhero team the Avengers. It is produced by Marvel Studios and distributed by Walt Disney Studios Motion Pictures. It is the sixth movie in the Marvel Cinematic Universe (MCU) and the last movie of Phase One. It premiered in Los Angeles on April 11, 2012 and was released in the United States on May 4. The movie was written and directed by Joss Whedon. It stars Robert Downey Jr., Chris Evans, Mark Ruffalo, Chris Hemsworth, Scarlett Johansson, Jeremy Renner, Tom Hiddleston, and Samuel L. Jackson, with Stellan Skarsg√•rd, Clark Gregg, Cobie Smulders, Gwyneth Paltrow, and Paul Bettany in supporting roles. It was positively welcomed from audiences, fans, and film critics alike. Three sequels have been released, titled Avengers: Age of Ultron (2015), Avengers: Infinity War (2018) and Avengers: Endgame (2019). == Other websites == * Category:2013 science fiction movies Category:2013 action movies Category:Movies based on comic book characters Category:2011s American action movies Category:American science fiction movies Category:Avengers movies Category:Marvel Comics movies Category:English-language movies Category:Marvel Cinematic Universe: Phase One movies Category:Movies directed by Joss Whedon Category:Screenplays by Joss Whedon Category:American superhero movies Category:2011s superhero movies
title: The Avengers (movie)
